org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter

类 ByteArrayComparable

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.ByteArrayComparable
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Comparable<byte[]>
    直接已知子类:
    BigDecimalComparator, BinaryComparator, BinaryPrefixComparator, BitComparator, LongComparator, NullComparator, RegexStringComparator, SubstringComparator

    @InterfaceAudience.Public
public abstract class ByteArrayComparable
extends Object
implements Comparable<byte[]>
    Base class for byte array comparators

      Special compareTo method for subclasses, to avoid copying byte[] unnecessarily.
      int compareTo(ByteBuffer value, int offset, int length)
      Special compareTo method for subclasses, to avoid copying bytes unnecessarily.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getValue

        public byte[] getValue()

      • toByteArray

        public abstract byte[] toByteArray()
        返回:
        The comparator serialized using pb

      • parseFrom

        public static ByteArrayComparable parseFrom(byte[] pbBytes)
                                     throws DeserializationException
        参数:
        pbBytes - A pb serialized ByteArrayComparable instance
        返回:
        An instance of ByteArrayComparable made from bytes
        抛出:
        DeserializationException
        另请参阅:
        toByteArray()

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(byte[] value)
        指定者:
        compareTo 在接口中 Comparable<byte[]>

      • compareTo

        public abstract int compareTo(byte[] value,
                              int offset,
                              int length)
        Special compareTo method for subclasses, to avoid copying byte[] unnecessarily.
        参数:
        value - byte[] to compare
        offset - offset into value
        length - number of bytes to compare
        返回:
        a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as this object is less than, equal to, or greater than the specified object.

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(ByteBuffer value,
                     int offset,
                     int length)
        Special compareTo method for subclasses, to avoid copying bytes unnecessarily.
        参数:
        value - bytes to compare within a ByteBuffer
        offset - offset into value
        length - number of bytes to compare
        返回:
        a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as this object is less than, equal to, or greater than the specified object.
